actualCost.title: Actual Cost
actualCost.description: Actual cost incurred for this campaign.

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: End date of the campaign. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

expectedResponse.title: Expected Response (%)
expectedResponse.description: Expected response rate in percentage (e.g., 10 for 10%).

isActive.title: Is Active
isActive.description: Indicates if the campaign is currently active. Defaults to false if not specified.

numberSent.title: Number Sent
numberSent.description: Number of individuals the campaign was sent to or targeted.

parentId.title: Parent Campaign ID
parentId.description: ID of the parent campaign, if this is a child campaign. Must be a valid 15 or 18 character Salesforce ID.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Start date of the campaign. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

status.title: Campaign Status
status.description: Status of the campaign (e.g., "Planned", "In Progress", "Completed"). Must be a valid picklist API name.

type.title: Campaign Type
type.description: Type of campaign (e.g., "Webinar", "Email", "Conference"). Must be a valid picklist API name.
